dealdata.name: Peacock
dealdata.title: An Exclusive Student Discount—Just for You
dealdata.desc_long:
Save now! You’re working hard for your education—here’s a reward for all your effort. Get Peacock for only $1.99/mo for 12 months and stream hit movies, live sports, exclusive Originals, and so much more.

Student verification required. Eligibility restrictions apply. Terms apply; see http://www.peacocktv.com/offer-terms/student
